body.name: LOLYKITCH 11 Inch Tri-ply 18/8 Stainless Steel Chef's Pan,Frying Pan with Lid,Skillet,Induction Pan,Pot and Pan Set,Dishwasher and Oven Safe.(Removable Handle)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 11 mins
features: ✅【Tri-Ply Construction】Made with a responsive aluminum core bonded together with 2 layers of durable, stainless steel all the way around for maximum durability and fast, even heat distribution.
✅【Food Grade Stainless Steel】Highly polished 18/8 food grade stainless-steel cooking surface with starburst finish offers superior stick resistance and easy maintenance, plus won’t react with food.

✅【Cool Toucb Handle Grip】Screw fixation detachable convenient storage stainless-steel long handle to ensure a safe grip while providing a comfortable grip and cool touch handle when cooking on the stovetop.

✅【Suitable for All Stove】Works on all cook stove tops, include induction, gas, electric, halogen, glass, and ceramic. The high quality stainless steels and the aluminum core make it dishwasher-safe and oven-safe up to 500°F. We always recommend to follow the included instruction for seasoning and maintaining the pan properly.
✅【Glass Lid with Steamer Vent】This stainless steel pan with a Glass Lid and steam vent allows you to monitor your food through the lid during the cooking.

✅【Your Reliable Cookware Partner】All the Cookware from Lolykitch in PFOA-Free,SGS Certified. Each pan and pot from Lolykitch heats quickly and spreads heat evenly because of our High-Control level of materials. We insist on upgrading the quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is so perfect for larger meal. Perfect size, perfect cooking and awesome clean-up! Love this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I loved it as soon as I opened the box. Much more sturdier than I expected. Good price skillet & came with a removable handle that was very easy to assemble. Lid is thick and fits securely on top with stainless steel rims. It is also a good size and big enough to cook a good amount of food in it. Well looks like I will be purchasing more of this stainless steel brand with a great price for my budget.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice pan, not surprisingly, a bit harder to keep clean
reviews.reviewText: Little by little I am getting rid of my teflon coated pots & pans - even if they’re still fine - and replacing them with pans like this one. This is a very good stainless steel pan and with the tri-ply construction, I’m finding it distributes heat nicely on my glass-top stove.Assembly of the handle was straightforward even if the supplied “spanner” I got didn’t actually fit the nuts that were provided. All you need is a small crescent wrench in any case and most of us have such a thing.The handle is good too in that it is hollow and seems to keep pretty cool and something you can take a hold of even without a mitt. I prefer this look and construction over ones that are plastic or rubber coated.Clean-up, in my experience, has been a bit more involved than my typical teflon coated non-stick pan, but I figured that might be the case. Still though, with a decent non-abrasive scrubber, there's not too much elbow grease involved. Sometimes I can get everything completely off and sometimes despite my scrubbing there is a bit of patina to the surface of the pan. But still, completely smooth and usable. In fact, it often all comes off after the next use & cleaning.Ultimately this is a nice addition and I expect to make use of it for years to come. In fact, given it doesn’t have a coating that will wear out, probably longer than some of the non-stick teflon pans I’ve had.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Does not stick if you follow directions!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very well made

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Serves the purpose
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice pan for frying and sauted food. The curve of the walls of the pan make it a bit more wok like than I had originally anticipated. It appears to have already lost some coating on the outside. I will use it as a place holder until I have fundage to buy a professional stainless steel skillet. If you find yourself in a similar situation, that product may suffice for you as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid addition to my kitchen!
reviews.reviewText: I recently welcomed the LOLYKITCH 11 Inch Tri-ply Stainless Steel Chef's Pan into my kitchen, and it has proven to be an outstanding addition to my cookware collection. Here's why this versatile pan has earned its place as a culinary marvel:Tri-ply Stainless Steel Excellence:The construction of this chef's pan is a standout feature. With a tri-ply design featuring 18/8 stainless steel, aluminum core, and stainless steel exterior, it provides optimal heat distribution and retention. This ensures even cooking and eliminates hot spots, allowing you to achieve precise culinary results.Multi-Functional Design:The LOLYKITCH Chef's Pan is a true multi-functional powerhouse. Its versatile design makes it suitable for various cooking methods, including frying, sautéing, simmering, and boiling. The addition of a lid transforms it into a convenient pot, adding to its versatility in the kitchen.Perfect Size and Shape:At 11 inches, this chef's pan strikes a perfect balance between being spacious enough for family-sized meals and compact enough for easy handling. The skillet's design is conducive to efficient stirring and flipping, making it a joy to use for a variety of recipes.Induction Ready and Oven Safe:The LOLYKITCH Chef's Pan is induction-compatible, catering to a wide range of cooking preferences. Additionally, it is oven safe, allowing you to seamlessly transition from stovetop to oven for recipes that require both cooking methods. This flexibility adds to the pan's convenience.Durable and Easy to Clean:Crafted from high-quality materials, this chef's pan is built to withstand the rigors of regular kitchen use. The stainless steel interior resists staining and maintains its polished appearance. Cleaning is a breeze, whether done by hand or in the dishwasher, making it a low-maintenance and durable kitchen companion.Comfortable Handle and Secure Lid:The ergonomic handle provides a comfortable grip, minimizing hand fatigue during extended cooking sessions. The secure-fitting lid traps heat and moisture, enhancing the pan's cooking capabilities and contributing to flavorful and succulent results.Sleek Aesthetics:Beyond its functionality, the LOLYKITCH Chef's Pan adds a touch of elegance to the kitchen with its sleek and polished stainless steel exterior. It seamlessly blends style with practicality, making it a visual delight in any kitchen setting.Conclusion:In conclusion, the LOLYKITCH 11 Inch Tri-ply Stainless Steel Chef's Pan is a culinary gem that elevates your cooking experience. Its tri-ply construction, versatility, and user-friendly features make it a must-have for home chefs who appreciate precision and quality in their cookware. Whether you're a seasoned cook or an aspiring culinary enthusiast, this chef's pan is sure to become a kitchen favorite.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: When I was talking to my mom about this pan, I told her I'd never used a stainless steel pan before -- she said that was wrong that she'd had some when I was growing up. So...I haven't used a stainless steel pan in my adult life, so I wasn't sure what to get. I had been expecting something more non-stick. Mom corrected me and told me that stainless steel isn't non-stick, so I was expecting the wrong thing. My biggest complaint with this was that in the description it said it was dishwasher safe. However, when I read the directions, it talked about cleaning and drying immediately. That's not a dishwasher pan. If you are familiar with stainless steel, and you already know that, then this is a great pan for you.
